roleset.name: come back strongly
roleset.note: RESURGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'resurge' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from resurge.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: Photographic companies are scrambling to tap the resurging market, reviving some black-and-white product lines and developing new ones.
